astec.title: Astec Interactive
astec.projectDescription: 3d Interactive touchscreen Unreal experience visualizing asphalt plant production equipment

content.article: This project was created in Unreal and utilized a 60 Inch Elo touch screen. This interactive display helped potential buyers to visualize massive construction machinery in a 3d space. This project was built using Unreal Engine and custom Blueprint scripts. A custom-built UI further programmaticm logic was used to interact with the 3d models as well as navigate through the visual experience.

images.caption: The Astec models were displayed along with sidebar in able to present further images and text, the info bar collapses via a hamburger button.
Astec Forms
images.alt: Forms were built to allow easy sign-up of new customers.

images.caption: The main page was sometimes an info-graphic, the product view was custom-built to be very flexible in content type.
The main product view was of a bisected 3d model, allowing customers to visualize large machines in a virtual space.
The start screen presents customers with a planet of construction equipment. This landing page serves as both a screen-saver and start screen
the main product was built to be rotated by touch!
Astec sales representative were broken down by state. Users can choose by state which representative to contact via form
Astec components were broken down by type is product in a type is presented in a touchable card
Users could see products associated in common plant configurations, then an infobox can be brought up to see more about each individual plant component
multiple plant view where users can choose the type of common configuration they might use

servpro-halloween.title: Servpro Halloween
servpro-halloween.projectDescription: A 2d reactive time-based game with a marketing twist, and a jump-scare ending!

content.article: Servpro Halloween was built in Vue with multiple reactive SVG objects. The game logic, data, state and routing are controlled via javascript and JSON. Servpro Halloween features user-controlled audio and is developed to work on mobile and desktop. The content is sized by ratio down to the smallest of screens.

images.caption: SVG objects were layered into the background and made selectable to minimize external calls.
Beware! If you take too long you may be presented with a scare!
Game instructions are presented prior to game play.
Info is presented to the user via landing page.
The Landing page is responsive for both desktop and mobile.
Even the Zombie was made to work responsively.
Since the game was based on a 16:9 ratio the phone must be rotated, users are progressively warned.
Users are presented various dialogue screens added directly to the viewport without switching pages.
Servpro Halloween's game-play was built to be as flexible as possible while maintaining a specfic 16:9 ratio.
All things, even scary, must come to an end... but they can be responsive too!
Another responsive view of the final screen.

servpro-prep.title: Servpro Prep
servpro-prep.projectDescription: A Vue based marketing solution as a micro-site.

mainImage.caption: Do you know which items you'll need in an emergency?

content.article: An interactive experience leveraging localStorage to limit game play and take return users right to the call-to-action

images.caption: SVGs were expertly placed on the screen for users to see.
All items picked are tallied and store in local data.
Items can be different
On landing users are presented with a default "Home" component
This page was meant to be viewed on any size screen.
Responsive forms using the POST method to send data as the CTA.
Your score is tallied and the user is offered to play again.
The game is made playable through flexible scss on any size screen.
Users are presented with a set of instructions before playing the game.
The dialogue box is as responsive as possible.
The game is locked to a horizontal aspect ratio so mobile device rotation is detected via javascript.
The Desktop Landing Page.

servpro-holiday.title: Servpro Holiday
servpro-holiday.projectDescription: A Christmas themed responsisve informational marketing one-page advertisement.

mainImage.caption: Do you know what dangers are present inside and out?

content.article: Servpro Holiday is an informational marketing advertisement built with Vue. Servpro Holiday tracks analytical data and user interaction. This informational website is presented with ultra-flexible info-boxes that are built to go anywhere on the page. Users can click through two seperate scenarios inside and outside of the house. Once users have read all info-boxes in one view the user is switched to the other view in a cancelable loop.

images.caption: The CTA is built to be responsive and flexible.
info boxes are placed via scss around the screen locked to a ratio.
Users are presented info-boxes through javascript transitions and animations.
Snow is dynamically generated from javascript based on animationFrame.
The page is responsive and can be viewed on desktop or mobile.
A mobile view of the landing page.
Each info box is the exact same component with different data. the box can open in any direction.
The responsive layout is locked to a screen ratio of 16:9.
the info boxes work with the dynamically generated snow.
